column4: so no ideas on how to get ubuntu to recognize the other 4 gigs on my mp3 player?
so what exactly is your problem?
execute that command while your MP3 stick is inserted

it's 4.1GB used and 3.6GB free that adds up to 7.7GB which is 8GB if you calculate accurately
